page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE IN UPWEY
page.content: THREE FAMILIES WERE PICKED AT RANDOM FROM THOSE LIVING IN ELWELL ST.UPWEY.EACH FAMILY WAS ASKED SIX QUESTIONS.THESE ARE THE REPLIES: {1.}FAMILY SIZE RANGED FROM 1 TO 5. {2.}MOST FAMILIES BEGAN THEIR DAY WITH A COMMUNAL BREAKFAST. {3.}MOST CHILDREN WENT TO A LOCAL SCHOOL,AND MOST PARENTS WORKED. {4.}MOST FAMILIES TOOK MEALS TOGETHER. {5.}THE FAVOURITE EVENING ENTERTAINMENTS WERE WATCHING T.V.,VISITING FRIENDS,AND GOING ON WALKS. {6.}MANY FAMILIES HAD RELATIVES LIVING LOCALLY. FROM THESE INTERVIEWS WE CONCLUDED THAT FAMILY LIFE IN UPWEY IS TRADITIONAL,AND MUST BE VERY LIKE FAMILY LIFE THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY.
